name: Great Air Race
description:
This game simulates flying on a small plane. The simulator has a HUD and basic controls. The flight physics are simplified to ensure ease of piloting. But in general, the game is aimed at a high level of realism.

There are few competitors in the race. The player's task is to be the first to get through the gate.

The game has two difficulty levels.

Controls

'Z'/'X' - throttle

'W'/'S' - pitch

'A'/'D' - roll

'Q'/'E' - yaw

'SPACE' - brake

'C' - camera
